column3: I left out fa8cd46  because I didn't feel like solving conflicts. Extended  tests seem to test pass locally.\n
Probably we want to do this  when the Python 3 transition is complete?\n

@laanwj I am not sure if it makes sense to do the py3 switch as part of this pull because I am waiting for travis to switch to trusty first. Then the question arises if we switch the 0.12 branch to trusty as well. Regardless of how we decide, I think the py3 switch for 0.12 should be a separate pull.\n
